name: Escape Train - Ryan Laley 2020
description:
Find your way off the subway by finding clues to open the keypad door! Have fun and try to watch your back!

This is our submission for Ryan Laley’s 2020 Games Jam. The theme for this jam was “Escape Room”. We are open to any and all feedback. Although we weren’t able to implement all our ideas we still hope you enjoy!

WASD - To Move

CTRL - Crouch

E - To Interact

R -To Drop Items
